thread.title: Excellent, friendly haven in the heart of Kensington
thread.title_full: Excellent, friendly haven in the heart of Kensington - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ciaran O
title: Excellent, friendly haven in the heart of Kensington
text:
Excellent, friendly haven in the heart of Kensington
Everything is really good: from the time we entered until the time we left. Exceptionally friendly staff. Very good food, well-presented. The breakfast is particularly good.
